attributes.action: re consider the case for Equitable Life Compensation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government has evaded its responsibility towards 1.25 million citizens of this country by rejecting both the findings of the Penrose report and the findings of the Parliamentary Ombudsman, showing a contempt of the P.O. office to the detriment of our Parliamentary institutions, and our right as citizens to justice against a Government that has set it face against any form of compensation for people who have paid into a pension all their lives, only to find that Governments of both parties have failed to properly regulate Equitable Life.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "re consider the case for Equitable Life Compensation."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
